item.title: VMware vSphere 5 licensing update explained
item.description: With the announcement of VMware vSphere 5 a complete new license model is introduces. In VMware vSphere 4 the licensing model was per physical processor based on the number of cores per CPU and the physical memory. The VMware vSphere 5 license model is based per physical processor and the allocated memory (vRAM) across the entire vSphere environment for a particular vSphere 5 edition (pool). Update August 27, 2012 Today VMware announcedÂ the end of the vRAM entitlement.
